com.mindfusion.scheduling.model

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.scheduling.model.Resource
      • com.mindfusion.scheduling.model.Task

  • public class Task
extends Resource
    Instances of this class contain task information. Task objects are used by schedule items that are allocated to some task.

    • Constructor Summary

      Initializes a new instance of the Task class.

                   XmlSerializationContext context)
        Description copied from class: Task
        Saves the task data to an XML document.
        Overrides:
        saveTo in class Resource
        Parameters:
        element - Allows adding data to the XML document.
        context - The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
